title: LiquidityPoolEntryConstantProduct

AlphaNum12.description:
AlphaNum12 is an XDR Struct defines as:

```text struct AlphaNum12 { AssetCode12 assetCode; AccountID issuer; }; ```

AlphaNum4.description:
AlphaNum4 is an XDR Struct defines as:

```text struct AlphaNum4 { AssetCode4 assetCode; AccountID issuer; }; ```

LiquidityPoolConstantProductParameters.description:
LiquidityPoolConstantProductParameters is an XDR Struct defines as:

```text struct LiquidityPoolConstantProductParameters { Asset assetA; // assetA < assetB Asset assetB; int32 fee; // Fee is in basis points, so the actual rate is (fee/100)% }; ```
